text: The 1963 Arab Cup was the 1st Arab Cup tournament which took place in Lebanon. Jordan, Kuwait, Lebanon, Syria and Tunisia participated in the tournament. == Group stage == Pos Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 1 4 4 0 0 11 1 +10 8 2 4 3 0 1 11 3 +8 6 3 4 2 0 2 13 4 +9 4 4 4 1 0 3 5 15 –10 2 5 4 0 0 4 0 17 –17 0 31 March 1963 align=right align=right 2 April 1963 align=right align=right 4 April 1963 align=right align=right 6 April 1963 align=right align=right 7 April 1963 align=right align=right == Other websites == *Details in RSSSF Category:FIFA Arab Cup Category:1963 in association football
